item.description:
Posted as an FYI, for those that might be interested:

If you went to the screening of The Greenhorns last month at AS220, then you may remember the announcement for this screening, so here are the details. Yay!:

Join Southside Community Land Trust and Whole Foods Market for a film screening of Seed Swap--a documentary that explores the art of seed swapping in the Ozarks and the related issues of hybrid seeds, patent rights and empowering people to grow their own food.
item.how_to_find_us: This is posted as an FYI (For Your Information) - I'm not sure I will be able to make this, but wanted you to know about it!
item.name: P-Collective FYI - FREE Movie Screening: SEED SWAP at the Cable Car!
